short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily flip or rotate videos with a click! Customizable keyboard shortcuts and user-friendly interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to mirror or rotate a video within the web page, services such as YouTube and Twitch are supported, but it works on the majority of sites. Customizable keyboard shortcuts and user-friendly interface.
